uni.hamburg.yamms.math
Class RealVectorField

java.lang.Object
  uni.hamburg.yamms.math.Field
      uni.hamburg.yamms.math.RealVectorField

public class RealVectorField
extends Field

N-dimensional vector field in the real space

Author:
Claas Abert

RealVectorField

public RealVectorField(Topology topology,
                       double[] values)
Constructor for linearized value support

Parameters:
topology - the topology
values - values of the vector field (column major order, the last index is the component of the field)

RealVectorField

public RealVectorField(Topology topology,
                       double[][] values)
Standard constructor

Parameters:
topology - the topology
values - values of the vector field (1st dimension of the array is the component of the field, 2nd dimension are the field values in column major order)

add

public RealVectorField add(RealVectorField vf)
Adds another real vector field and returns the result

Parameters:
vf - the real vector field to be added
Returns:
the sum of the vector fields

applyTopology

public RealVectorField applyTopology(Topology newTopology)
Applies another topology to the vector field and return the resulting field. If the new topology is bigger than the current one, the field will be zero padded. if the new topology is smaller than the field will be cropped.

Parameters:
newTopology - the topology to be applied
Returns:
the resulting vector field

Returns:

laplaceWithBounds

public RealVectorField laplaceWithBounds(BooleanField bounds)
Calculates the second derivative of the field with a nearest neighbor method. Takes a bounds argument for limiting the calculation of the derivative to certain areas.

Parameters:
bounds - a boolean field (true: is taken into account, false: is not taken into account)
Returns:
the resulting field
